articles.description: Thomas Tuchel explained to ProSoccerTalk his recent treatment of Christian Pulisic, as the USMNT star was the hero for Chelsea against West Ham.
articles.content: LONDON Christian Pulisic has found minutes hard to come by for Chelsea in recent weeks and moments after the USMNT star was the hero for the Blues against West Ham, Thomas Tuchel explained to ProSocc… [+3385 chars]

articles.title: MRI confirms ligament tear in Joel Embiid's thumb, surgery expected after playoffs - PhillyVoice.com
articles.description: "It just confirmed what we thought," Doc Rivers said Sunday. "There literally will be no change. We thought what it was, and it was. So you just keep moving on."
articles.content: Sixers center Joel Embiid has a torn ligament in his thumb, an MRI confirmed on Sunday, matching fears already held internally by the front office. Head coach Doc Rivers would not outright name the d… [+5706 chars]
